features: INTIMATE + BODY WASH. This pH balanced wash is safe for intimate skin and great all over. Luxurious, sulfate-free lather gently lifts away impurities while replenishing vital lipids for soft, nourished skin.
99% NATURALLY DERIVED. Made with intimate skin-safe ingredients like Coconut Cleansers, Shea Butter, Apricot + Jojoba Oil, and Aloe Vera to respect and protect your sweet spots.

GYNECOLOGIST APPROVED. SweetSpot Labs formulas are clinically-tested on sweet spots by unbiased gyns & derms and proven to be both non-irritating + effective. Our pH-balanced feminine wash is free from common irritants, allergens, comedogenics, and hormone disruptors.

PLANET-POSITIVE. Our goal is simple: deliver solutions that are better for you and better for the planet. Vegan & cruelty-free feminine wash for women is packaged in reclaimed/recycled plastics and without any unnecesary secondary packaging.

OUR SWEET SPOT. We believe that healthy intimate skin is connected to a healthy spirit. That's why we've been passionately pioneering clean + clinically proven intimate skincare, and inspiring a healthier way of seeing, talking about and taking care of our sweet spots - since 2003.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: BUY THIS!!!! You will not regret it. The product keeps me smell free, soft and supple!! The smell is not to strong but soft and perfect. Every time I shower with this product I feel absolutely refreshed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars In just one day, my intimate area is completely changed!
reviews.reviewText: I usually don't write reviews cuz life is busy, but I needed to share this! Ladies, this wash is absolute MAGIC for helping ease any smell, frequent discharge, and unwanted wetness,etc. I have been using an older sweet spot's lab product for many years now, and this new one completely surpassed the older formula! I am a very clean gal, even have bidets in every bathroom, But no matter what almost everyday it would be uncomfortable and smelly down there even after showering 30 minutes before. I have constantly been trying to find something that could help ease all of that and this did that even after one application. I feel so much more comfortable now that I'm not constantly worried about smell or underwear getting uncomfortable as the day goes on. Every time I use it, I feel so clean and comfortable. I had pretty low expectations for this, but it genuinely has saved me from being so uncomfortable everyday! This is my new favorite shower product!I can't wait to try some of their new products when I get the chance! I'd recommend this to anyone! It's also unscented so you don't have to worry about it smelling bad or irritating your special spot 💜Don't think, just buy it! You won't regret it 🩵

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff is fantastic
reviews.reviewText: I have tried lume prior to this product and all I can say is wow! This stuff smells so much better than lume and works better - clearing that butt stank away. Definitely gonna keep buying this stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using Sweet Labs Co Feminine Wash for a few weeks now, and I’m impressed with the results. The gentle formula is refreshing and leaves me feeling clean without any irritation. I appreciate that it’s made with natural ingredients and has a subtle, pleasant scent that isn’t overpowering. While I’ve noticed an improvement in my overall freshness and comfort, I wish the bottle were a bit larger for the price. Overall, it’s a great product that I would recommend to others looking for a gentle and effective feminine wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can’t live without this wash! It’s the best for athletes
reviews.reviewText: I’m an athlete and this Wash works super well to balance my skin because I take 2 showers per day and am sweating a lot during training. My skin feels so soft and supple, and it also works “down there” without irritating my vulva skin. All the other body washes I’ve tried that claim to be “clean ingredient” irritate me down there. This is fragrance free and works with my skin’s pH to balance and hydrate all day and night. Love it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and lasts forever
reviews.reviewText: A lot of feminine washes nowadays can be really bad for you, so I decided to try something new. I am glad I tried this product and have been using it for a couple of years now! It has a very very light scent, just enough to not be irritating. It is excellent for sensitive skin. You only need a tiny bit at a time and the bottle lasts me at least 6 months! I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't trigger malasezzia yeast yay!
reviews.reviewText: I can use this on my sensitive skin and it doesn't trigger yeast flares. Doesn't irritate, balanced ph too. No smell.I don't know why other products put oils and glycerin (sugary) in products :(. I am glad this one is free of that stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works well, but suspect ingredients
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this product for a year and have enjoyed it, but have concerns about some of the ingredients like Glycol Distearate and phenoxyethanol. It has some really great moisturizing, soothing ingredients. I just don't understand the need for these toxic ingredients. Why use a formula with a laundry list of ingredients, instead of just a few good quality ones?

reviews.reviewTitle: Truly unscented. Soft and moisturizing. Tiny bit goes a long, long way.
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for something that I could use for female private parts and underarm odor. Even after I bath or wash with soap, it does not eliminated the odor completely. I cannot use an anti bacterial soap because of the high fragrance. I have allergies to scented products. Used this SweetSpot feminine wash for the first time today and it completely eliminated the odor and even after couple of hours, the odor has not returned. It is truly unscented. Soft and moisturizing. Finger nail size amount goes a long, long way. Will see how long the effectiveness lasts. At this point, I am very happy with this product and I will buy it again. I hope Amazon continues to sell it. 5 stars.

The product is great! I tried it in a sample I received. Went to Amazon to buy more, the description clearly states 3 pack and the price reflects it as well. I only got one item instead of three. Buyer be aware. If you managed to get the product- it smells great, very soft and gentle wash. Love it.Edit: i returned the one bottle that was sent to me and ordered it again. This time i got the whole pack ( all 3 of them) so- Happy with my purchase! I have updated the rating, but i am keeping the original comment for others to be aware.

I have incredibly sensitive skin and this product has worked wonders for me. I am impressed with the silky texture. It is truly unscented and I have never had any issue with its formula. I will be repurchasing for sure.

This is a product I've used before, smells great, works great for a body wash and can double as a shaving cream.My only negative comment is that I ordered the 3 pack from AMAZON but the box contained only 2 bottles. The pack itself said contents:3.

It definitely is amazing for sensitive skin- but my tube (bottle? container?) arrived popped, and open at the top. Thankfully it didn’t spill out too much, and I can still use it.. but that part sucked! (No fault of the company or product itself obviously, it was packed into a box with heavier shampoo and lotion, so it got smunched in transit..)Smells nice, leaves you feeling fresh and clean! I’d buy it again 💕
